Description: Fragment preserving complete profile of North Ionian pottery bowl; disc foot. Interior glazed save for tondo, with three added red bands lined, roughly, in white; in tondo five-leaf rosette with central dot. Exterior: lip zone reserved as far as preserved; six bands on lower wall; bottom of wall and outside of foot glazed, underside reserved.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1076)
